title: . . . The Chimera with Green Eyes Turns, Bays (. . . La Chimère aux yeux verts tournoie, aboie) from The Temptation of Saint Anthony (La Tentation de Saint-Antoine)
medium: Lithograph on chine appliqué from a portfolio of 11 lithographs (including cover, ten on chine appliqué)
